name: B.o.E
description:
B.o.E is a first person team based shooter, that allows to buy upgrades at the end of the round in order to change weapons, stats or the drone you are flying. Each drone has different physical stats, amor, health and speed. Some weapons will be strong against armored drones, some will be good for shooting fast enemies (aka fighters).

This prototype has a an AI for training purposes, a match-making server and a dedicated server for multiplayer games. It only consists of a single level and currently all drones of a faction look the same. But flying around (using the unarmored drones) and shooting is wild and fun! Check it out.
Nest steps:

  • drone models for each team and class
  • user interface: weapon loading time, ship health, shop details (currently some items unlock others or have multiple changes), current drone stats, chat window, leaderboard with frags, an escape menu to change loudness and to actually quit the game
  • map ideas:  nice hills to glide over (like flower, but now with guns), small islands on a lake, snow-desert-dunes, sci-fi world with worm holes, lava cavern
  • drone features: indestructable front shields, different areas of armor, cloaking, auto-turrets, AI drones that either fly in formation with you (line, X, and claw) or can be send in a direction when flying a command drone
